summary: Makes the lighting more realistic without the use of screen shader injections or other post-processing.
descriptionHtml:
The \"fixes\" in this mod for exteriors:
- More powerful sun color
- Lighter sunset/sunrise skies
- Lighter cloudy skies
- Darker ambient color
- Very dark nights (If it\'s too dark, you may need to fix your monitor\'s brightness, try this: http://www.lagom.nl/lcd-test/black.php)
- Fixed color balance and saturation for all weather types to look realistic
- Removed bloom
- Removed forced contrast increase

For interiors:
- Removed fake \"reflected light\" color
- Darker interiors
- Very dark dungeons
- Fixed saturation, the color balance was fine
- Removed bloom (candles still glow from particles)
- Removed forced contrast increase

For exteriors:
-Add vertex lighting
-Add colors to Solitude and Windhelm
-Add better textures for the dragons.
-Modify colors of the torches(Night and Days)


This affects all weather, all interiors, and all dungeons. Some special quest areas or quest weather states may not be affected.

Current Version:1.0

I have a Intel Core i7 3770k and a GTX 680 and it runs at 90fps.So the framerate doesn\'t drops a lot.

PS:There is weekly updates.
author: 3D
